sections.content: When you use our contact form, we collect the information you provide, which may include your name, email address, phone number, and any message content you share with us.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Personal Information
sections.content: We use the information you provide via the contact form to communicate with you and address your inquiries or requests.

sections.heading: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. Please contact us for assistance with these requests.

sections.heading: Data Retention
sections.content: We will maintain your contact information only for as long as necessary to respond to your inquiry.
